entry.title: Days Creek’s ‘Little House’ does it all: On-campus property has been used for many things over the years
entry.summary: The ‘Little House’ has been a lot of things for Days Creek Charter School. It’s housed superintendents; it’s been a rental property; it’s been a business office; and now it’s a music studio.
